# Ignore target folders for both projects
telecom/target/
payment-gateway/target/

# Test output and reports
telecom/test-output/
payment-gateway/test-output/

# Ignore screenshots
**/screenshots/

# Class files
**/*.class

# Eclipse project files
.project
.classpath
.settings/
**/.settings/

# IntelliJ IDEA files
.idea/
*.iml

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
